description: doc: mention availability of race detector in go1.1 doc

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM with tweak

https://codereview.appspot.com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.html
File doc/go1.1.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.html#newcode294
doc/go1.1.html:294: on Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows systems with 64-bit x86 processors.
just adding this sentence.
For now, it is only available on Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows systems with 64-bit x86 processors.

"available only" reads better


On Wed, Apr 3, 2013 at 10:08 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM with tweak
>
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.**html<https://codereview.appspot.com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.html>
> File doc/go1.1.html (right):
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.**
> html#newcode294<https://codereview.appspot.com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.html#newcode294>
> doc/go1.1.html:294: on Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows systems with 64-bit
> x86 processors.
> just adding this sentence.
> For now, it is only available on Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows systems
> with 64-bit x86 processors.
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8301044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8301044/>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7208ab5ec118 ***

doc: mention availability of race detector in go1.1 doc

R=r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8301044

Worth another cl?


On 4 April 2013 16:09, Rob Pike <r@golang.org> wrote:

> "available only" reads better
>
>
> On Wed, Apr 3, 2013 at 10:08 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:
>
>> LGTM with tweak
>>
>>
>> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.**html<https://codereview.appspot.com/8301044/diff/1/doc/go1.1.html>

>> x86 processors.
>> just adding this sentence.
>> For now, it is only available on Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows systems
